About Me

I am a Teaching Associate Professor at the Colorado School of Mines in the Computer Science department. I am also a PhD Candidate in the same department. My research focus is Computer Science Education utilizing gamification and generative AI.

Feel free to download my CV.

Publications

  1. K. Kelly, B. Wu, and C. Liebe, “Gamification Powered by a Large Language Model to Enhance Flipped Classroom Learning in Undergraduate Computer Science,” European Conference on Games Based Learning, vol. 18, pp. 930–937, Oct. 2024. [PDF]

Research

I am a Teaching Associate Professor at the Colorado School of Mines in the Computer Science department. I am also a PhD Candidate in the same department. My research focus is Computer Science Education utilizing gamification and generative AI.
